item.title: Zelensky gives stark warning as EU leaders hold crunch talks on Russia's frozen assets
item.description: The EU is deciding whether to loan tens of billions of euros of Russian money to fund Ukraine's military and economic needs.

item.title: Trump Media to merge with nuclear fusion firm in $6bn deal
item.description: The company behind President Trump's Truth Social platform makes a surprising move into the energy sector.

item.title: Peter Arnett, Pulitzer-winning war reporter, dies aged 91
item.description: He was known for covering the Vietnam and Gulf Wars - and for interviewing both Saddam Hussein and Osama bin Laden.

item.title: Peter Arnett, Pulitzer-winning war reporter, dies aged 91
item.description: He was known for covering the Vietnam and Gulf Wars - and for interviewing both Saddam Hussein and Osama bin Laden.

item.title: French 'Doctor Death' who poisoned patients jailed for life
item.description: A court finds Frédéric Péchier guilty of contaminating infusion bags with substances that caused cardiac arrest or hemorrhaging.
